gurmukhi: Kg miRg mIn pqMg crwcr join Anyk ibKY BRm AwieE
transliteration: Khag Mrig Meen Patang Charaachara , Joni Anayk Bikhai Bhram Aaiao ?
translation: Swaiye: A living being has wandered in many species of birds, animals, fish, insects, root and conscious beings.

gurmukhi: suin suin pwie rswql BUql dyvpurI pRq lau bhu DwieE
transliteration: Souni Souni Paai Rasaatal Bhootala , Dayvapuree Prat Lau Bahu Dhaaiao ?
translation: He wandered in the nether regions, earth and heaven in order to practice whatever sermons he had heard.

gurmukhi: jog hU Bog duKwid suKwidk Drm ADrm su krm kmwieE
transliteration: Jog Hoo Bhog Doukhaadi Soukhaadika , Dharam Adharam Su Karam Kamaaiao ?
translation: He kept performing good and bad deeds bearing the comforts and sufferings of various practices of Yoga.

gurmukhi: hwir pirE srnwgq Awie gurU muK dyK grU suK pwieE ]422]
transliteration: Haari Pariao Saranaagat Aai , Guru Moukh Daykh Garoo Soukh Paaiao ?422?
translation: He got tired going through these countless rigours of many births and then comes to the refuge of the True Guru. By adopting and accepting the teachings of the True Guru and beholding His glimpse, he is able to achieve the great spiritual comfort and peac
